Package oracle.dss.gauge

Interface Summary
CustomToolTipCallback This interface provides a callback for overriding the tool tips that the Gauge provides by default.
GaugeAttributes This interface contains all of the property keys and constant values needed to customize a gauge.
GaugeConstants  
GaugeController Methods that the gauge needs from a controller.
GaugeModel Methods that the gauge needs from a model.
GaugeRenderer  
GaugeSetAttributes This interface contains all of the property keys and constant values needed to customize a gauge set.

CustomShapesParser This class is for internal use only.

ThresholdComponentHandle This is the component handle for threshold, which extends data component handle

- Threshold set through Data Specification:
For example: if we have 2 threshold values, we will have 3 threshold areas.
